name: World's End Chapter 2
summary:
The darkly comedic strategy RPG continues. Guide Tevoran and Company and their dubious new allies against bizarre creatures and environmental hazards. Enrage and confuse your enemies, throw exploding obstacles, and roundhouse-kick your way to questionable victory. 
 
Features 
4 new playable characters 
More powerful skills and attacks for veteran characters to learn 
Enemy spawning, survival and four-way free-for-all battle variations 
New status effects including Contagion, Enraged and HP Regeneration 
Option to continue from Chapter 1 saves 
New original soundtrack
